alert.note: Alert for Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 29 at 5:09AM EDT until October 29 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Indiana, Steuben County. In Michigan, Branch and Hillsdale Counties. In Ohio, Williams, Fulton OH, Defiance, Henry, Paulding and Putnam Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If you are driving or planning to drive early this morning in this area, slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. Be alert for rapid changes in the visibility.
